com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.kmeans

Class KMeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.BaseClusterer
      • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.AbstractClusterer
        • com.oculusinfo.ml.unsupervised.cluster.kmeans.KMeans
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clusterer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DPMeans

    public class KMeans
extends AbstractClusterer
    The class implements the K-Means clustering algorithm using the K++ method for initializing the k-means
    Author:
    slangevin

      • isCandidate

        protected boolean isCandidate(Instance inst,
                  Cluster candidate,
                  double score,
                  Cluster best,
                  double bestScore)
        Description copied from class: AbstractClusterer
        Method for determining whether a cluster is a better candidate than the previous best candidate cluster.
        Specified by:
        isCandidate in class AbstractClusterer
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance being clustered
        candidate - is the cluster
        score - is the double precision value of the distance score of inst to candidate
        best - is the current best cluster the inst can be added to
        bestScore - is the current best score
        Returns:
        true if candidate is a better cluster for inst than best
